React Native first App ☕️

19 Dec 2015

My very first React Native application 🖖🏼

I am feeling very motivated to learn this new technology. But first, not worth going too fast. I will begin with a very simple app. Which has been created at least one billion times. A fucking shitty coffee finder app !!! Awesome, let’s do it !! 👉☕️

The project is available, on 😺 GitHub!.

So first, I will fetch the data on Foursquare, because their API, is very simple to use, and it’s good 👍. This is currently how I fetch the data from the Foursquare API.

More details are coming soon. Can’t wait to release this shitty app on the market. meanwhile you can give me a star, and I will give you a coffee : ⭐️🤓👉☕️
